advancement.chang_sheng_jue.accessguildt: Watch as I shake the heavens and stir the world!
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.agroupgangto: What I carry is not just a street—it's the world! The common people of all under heaven!
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.beatleader.d: This wooden seat is certainly more comfortable than one made of blades—at least it doesn't stab you in the rear.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.begin.desc: The vast world is full of wonders
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.donefinaltas: Since I am a man with passions and desires, how can my heart be content with an unjust world?
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.donefivetask: Learn to say no; you can't unclog every toilet.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.findchinesev: From north to south, the land is as beautiful as a painting!
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.finishtask.d: Read more to avoid being deceived. Study history to better distinguish right from wrong.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.gongfadone.d: Humans have passions and desires; swords do not, martial arts do not. At the pinnacle of the Forbidden City, who dares challenge me?
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasadvanceda: Though the armor is sturdy, let it not lie buried in dust.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasarmor.des: Though the armor is simple, let the heart be as steadfast as stone.
Strengthens the spleen, nourishes the stomach, aids digestion, promotes weight loss, boosts energy, and calms the spirit.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasbronzeswo: A true wanderer fears no power, fights for justice, protects the weak, upholds righteousness, and selflessly serves without regard for personal gain.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasgoldbulli: True gold shines, no matter where it's placed!
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasguihuatan: May your life continue sweetly, or may a sweet new chapter unfold.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.haslichee.de: A steed raises red dust, the consort smiles; none know that lychees have arrived.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasmifan: Food is the Staff of Life
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasmifan.des: Man relies on food, iron relies on steel; miss one meal and hunger you'll feel.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hasqitian.de: Where is the Great Sage, Equal of Heaven? Where lies the path to longevity? Where is the future?
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hassilverbul: Though silver may tarnish with time, its inner luster remains bright.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hassword.des: Supreme in the martial world, the treasured blade slays the dragon; none dare disobey when it commands the realm!
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hastea.desc: Since Shennong tasted a hundred herbs and drank tea to detoxify, the history of tea has flowed long and deep.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.hastomatoegg: A common dish anyone can make, yet each cook brings their own unique flavor.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.haswine: Sing Facing Wine, How Long Does Life Last?
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.haswine.desc: Like morning dew, gone are many bitter days.
If one slacks off at the first setback, how can they achieve greatness later?
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.mastergongfa: Though achievements exist, remember: there is always someone better, and skies beyond the sky.
advancement.chang_sheng_jue.usewaigong.d: With a reliable sword in hand, roam the world with ease and grace.

chang_sheng_jue.function.blue_and_white_: Blue and White Porcelain Flower Pot
Functions identically to the vanilla flower pot.
chang_sheng_jue.function.brush_and_lime_: Hold any Lime Slurry Bucket in the off-hand and the Brush in the main hand to paint entire Red Brick blocks into white walls of the corresponding color scheme. The Lime Slurry Bucket becomes empty after 12 uses.
chang_sheng_jue.function.bullions_castin: Right-click to place the mold on the ground. Hold a [Crucible (Gold/Silver Liquid)] and right-click to pour it in.
chang_sheng_jue.function.casting_molds.p: Used for casting copper coins. Right-click to place the mold on the ground. Hold a [Crucible (Copper Liquid)] and right-click to pour it in.
An essential tool for making copper coins and bullions.$(br)Can be combined with 8 Copper/Silver/Gold to create a Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Fragments).$(br)[Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Fragments)] can be smelted in a furnace to obtain [Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Liquid)].
Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Fragments) can be smelted in a furnace to obtain Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Liquid).
Crucible (Copper/Silver/Gold Liquid) can be poured into molds to create: Copper Coins / Gold or Silver Bullions.
chang_sheng_jue.function.desc: Many strange people have come from that spatial rift. They can not only dance with fire to create phoenixes and fly through the skies, but they have also brought many peculiar objects. Rumor has it they come from the East?
chang_sheng_jue.function.ladder.page1.te: The ladder is three blocks high and can be extended upward by placing more sections. (If the player is at the edge of a block, placing the ladder forward one block will cause the player to crouch/climb onto it).
chang_sheng_jue.function.painting_scroll: Comes in four sizes (1x1, 2x1, 1x2, 2x2). Functions like vanilla paintings, with various patterns available.
chang_sheng_jue.function.plaque.page1.te: Right-click the plaque to write text on it. Places on the side of a block, functioning like a sign (can be connected left/right to adjust plaque length).
chang_sheng_jue.function.stone_lamp.page: The Stone Lamp has two states: Lit and Unlit.$(br)Use a Flint and Steel to light it. Serves as a light source with brightness equal to a Candlestick.
The base for the Stone Lamp. Purely decorative.
chang_sheng_jue.function.zhu_tai.page1.t: Functions like a torch, illuminating a 12-block radius.
chang_sheng_jue.village.desc: Chinese-style villages of all sizes are scattered across the Minecraft continent, bringing many novelties with them...
chang_sheng_jue.village.tool.chang_sheng: Usage: Hold $(item)Mulberry Silk$() in the main hand and right-click the loom to weave it into $(item)Silk$().$(br)Yield: 2 Mulberry Silk → 1 Silk
Growth Acceleration: $(li)Can place $(item)Wheat$()$(br)Effect: Increases growth speed of nearby animals by 20%.
chang_sheng_jue.village.tool.pottery_whe: Interaction: $(li)1 Clay → Craft $(item)Porcelain Cup$()$(li)2 Clay → Craft $(item)Porcelain Bowl$()$(li)3 Clay → Craft $(item)Porcelain Plate$()
Maintenance: Hold a $(item)Bow$() in the main hand and right-click the Tool Table to quickly repair its durability.
chang_sheng_jue.village.villager.chief.p: Right-clicking the Chief has a 50%% chance to trigger the village quest [Suppress Tyrants and Pacify the People]. Completion yields certain rewards.
$(br)$(li)1x Silver Bullion → 6x A String of Ancient Coin$(br)$(li)1x Gold Bullion → 6x Silver Bullion$(br)$(li)7x A String of Ancient Coin → 1x Silver Bullion$(br2)
$(br)$(li)1x Diamond → 4x A String of Ancient Coin$(br)$(li)4x A String of Ancient Coin → 2x Candlestick$(br)$(li)7x Silver Bullion → 1x Gold Bullion$(br2)

$(br)$(li)4x Osmanthus Sugar Lotus Root → 4x A String of Ancient Coin$(br)$(li)4x A String of Ancient Coin → 4x Pork Belly Chicken Soup

Expert:$(br)$(li)7x Deer Antler → 14x A String of Ancient Coin$(br2)Master:$(br)$(li)5x Tiger Skin → 15x A String of Ancient Coin

chang_sheng_jue.village.villager.seamstr: $(br)$(li)6x Silk Thread → 4x A String of Ancient Coin$(br)$(li)22x Cotton → 4x A String of Ancient Coin$(br2)
$(br)$(li)4x A String of Ancient Coin → 4x Silk$(br2)
$(br)$(li)28x A String of Ancient Coin → 1x Taoist Parcel$(br)$(li)28x A String of Ancient Coin → 1x Taoist robe Parcel$(br2)

Expert:$(br)$(li)6x Silver Bullion → 1x Kirin supplementary clothing Parcel$(br)$(li)6x Silver Bullion → 1x Huiyi Parcel$(br)$(li)6x Silver Bullion → 1x Wanderer's Garb Bundle$(br)$(li)6x Silver Bullion → 1x Scholar's Robe Bundle$(br2)Master:$(br)$(li)8x Silver Bullion → 1x Golden Cotton armor Parcel$(br2)
chang_sheng_jue.village.villages.cave_dw: Often generates in plateau/mesa biomes. Constructed by excavating into the earth, providing warmth in winter and coolness in summer—a unique architectural form. Common crops: Sugar Cane, Jalapenos, Mango, Pineapple.
chang_sheng_jue.village.villages.courtya: Often generates in plains biomes. A courtyard surrounded by buildings on all four sides, hence the name 'Siheyuan'. Common crops: Sorghum, Corn, Wheat, Soybean, Grain.
chang_sheng_jue.village.villages.huizhou: Often generates in forest biomes. Huizhou民居 (Mínjū) are famous for their white walls, black tiles, and horse-head gables. Look at the exquisite carved doors and windows! Common crops: Lotus Root, Peanut, Brinjal, Pear.
chang_sheng_jue.village.villages.sandsto: Often generates in desert biomes. A fortress-style village built from sandstone, well-stocked and resistant to raids, like a pearl in the desert. Common crops: Cotton, Tomato, Grapes, Cantaloupe.
Often generates in jungle biomes. The simple yet elegant style with white walls and black tiles, combined with upward-curving roof ridges, is an artistic model of Suzhou architecture. Common crops: Lychee, Banana, Durian, Rice.
chang_sheng_jue.wufanglu.desc: "If Heaven had feelings, Heaven too would grow old; The rightful path on earth is full of strife and change."$(br)How can one seek longevity without knowledge? Understand heaven and earth, comprehend all things.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.desc: Somehow, the situation here has changed. More people claiming to uphold justice have appeared, often calling themselves 'Xia' or 'Xiake' (Chivalrous Heroes).
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.equipment.page1.te: Wuxia equipment not only provides Armor Toughness and/or Armor points like vanilla gear but can also reduce external (Wai Gong) damage taken. Equipment can be crafted or purchased from blacksmiths in new towns using currency. Most armor supports color customization for appearance—try it!$(br)The first time you craft or use a ChangShengJue chestpiece, it will generate random attributes for mitigating external damage and reducing the chance of receiving Trauma (Wai Shang).
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.equipment.page2.te: Inner Armor can be worn underneath a ChangShengJue chestpiece, increasing its Armor points or toughness.$(br)Two ways to equip it: 1. Wear the Inner Armor first, then put on the desired chestpiece. 2. Hold the Inner Armor in the off-hand, the chestpiece in the main hand, and press SHIFT + Right-Click.$(br)Inner Armor can also be worn alone like a regular chestpiece.$(br)
Used for crafting weapons, armor, etc. View selected items within the forge interface. Crafting automatically consumes required materials from your inventory.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.internal_injury.pa: Effects per stack: +5%% damage taken, -5%% effectiveness of worn armor, 5%% chance per second to be stunned. Duration: 15 seconds. Empty-hand attacks on a target already affected add 1 stack and extend duration by 2 seconds. Max 5 stacks; effects double per level.

When an empty-hand external skill (Wai Gong) is active: Empty-hand attacks inflict Level 1 Internal Injury; using an empty-hand Wai Gong attack inflicts Level 2.$(br)Holding Golden Thread Gloves in the main hand counts as an empty-hand attack.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.martial_arts_manua: Can be obtained as rewards for completing Gang or Village quests, or rarely dropped by martial NPCs.

Manuals are categorized: External Skills (Wai Gong, mainly active), Internal Skills (Nei Gong, mainly passive), Lightness Skills (Qing Gong, affecting movement), and Heart Methods (Xin Fa, providing special bonuses). Descriptions explain effects. Right-click to learn how to comprehend and execute the skill.

After learning Sword Wai Gong: Sword attacks have 15%% chance to cause Bleeding (1 HP/0.5s for 1s). Blade Wai Gong: 15%% chance for Critical Hit (+15%% damage). Staff Wai Gong: 15%% chance to Stun (0.5s). Spear Wai Gong: 15%% chance to Launch target (0.7s).
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.quest.page1.text: Right-click a Gang Leader to accept gang quests from the quest interface. Completing them rewards Gang Tokens, Martial Arts Manuals, currency, etc. Other quests may trigger automatically during gameplay (most are auto-accepted and completed upon meeting conditions), rewarding martial arts secrets, currency, etc.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.stakes.page2.text: Internal Skills (Nei Gong), Lightness Skills (Qing Gong), and empty-hand External Skills (Wai Gong) can be practiced/comprehended by hitting the stake. 15%% comprehension chance per hit.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.tailoring_case.pag: Used for crafting clothing (armor). View selected items within the bench interface. Crafting automatically consumes required materials from your inventory.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.tea.page1.text: Drinking tea helps you recover Health or Saturation faster. Check the tea's description for specific effects.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.trauma.page1.text: Effects per stack: -5%% damage dealt, -5%% speed, 1%% HP drain per second. Duration: 7 seconds. Weapon attacks on an affected target extend duration by 1 second (a stronger level overwrites previous). Max 5 stacks; effects double per level.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.trauma.page2.text: When a weapon-based Wai Gong is active: Weapon attacks have 25%% chance to inflict Level 1-2 Trauma; using the (weapon) Wai Gong attack guarantees Level 1-5 Trauma.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.weapon.page1.text: Some External Skills require specific weapons to perform. You can craft weapons or exchange Gang Tokens for them at gang bases. Completing gang quests unlocks access to peerless weapons.
chang_sheng_jue.xiake.wine.page1.text: Drinking wine can reduce skill cooldowns, decrease hunger cost for skills, increase skill damage, etc. Check the wine's description for details. Don't overindulge—you might get drunk!

death.attack.martial_arts: %1$s had their internal organs shattered by %2$s using martial arts.
message.kungfu.chang_sheng_jue.external_: Still need to attack targets with %s to gain practical comprehension!
and mastered! Hold right with %s for %s seconds to charge and unleash the technique!
Activated! Hold right-click with %s for %s seconds to charge and unleash the technique!
Activated! Attack on Practice stakes with bare hands or %s to gain comprehension!
message.kungfu.chang_sheng_jue.internal_: Still need to attack on practice stakes with %s to gain comprehension!
Activated! After mastery, use %s to unleash the technique!
Activated! Attack on Practice stakes with bare hands to gain comprehension!
message.kungfu.chang_sheng_jue.succeed.c: Comprehended %s! Hold right-click with %s for %s seconds to charge and unleash the technique!
Comprehended %s! Hold right-click with %s for %s seconds to charge and unleash the technique!
message.kungfu.chang_sheng_jue.succeed.l: %s studied! Now attack targets with %s to gain practical comprehension!
%s studied! Now attack on practice stakes with bare hands or %s to gain comprehension!
%s studied! Now attack on practice stakes with %s to gain comprehension!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.ao_qi_tian_di_jian: I possess great strength; why use it against the weak? If the world is unjust, I shall rectify it! Even against a hundred, what is there to fear? Face them with wisdom and courage.
Proud Spirit Between Heaven and Earth
quest.chang_sheng_jue.automatic.death.qu: The world is vast; where can it not accommodate a person?
Die less than 1 time in 7 days.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.automatic.tian_ruo: The true path in the human world is fraught with hardship.
If Heaven Had Feelings, It Too Would Age
quest.chang_sheng_jue.automatic.vegetari: Gang Leader: With a compassionate heart, refrain from taking life.
Do not kill any creatures for 2 in-game days.
Because of you, no one dares to bully the villagers here, and you have also settled down to a peaceful life.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.food.questDescript: Gang Leader: The brothers are running low on provisions again. We can't go on with empty stomachs. Brother, can you find a way to get some food?
quest.chang_sheng_jue.gather.food.questD: Village Chief: The recent harvest is poor, and winter will be hard. Great hero, can you help us gather some food to get through this difficult time?
quest.chang_sheng_jue.gather.money.quest: Village Chief: This is truly a bumper harvest! But so much grain will spoil if stored too long. Great hero, can you help us find a solution?
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.arbitrarily.q: Gang Leader: Brother, if you wish to join our gang, you must first prove your loyalty with an oath of allegiance!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.assassin.ques: You helped the village resist the gangs. Now major factions have made you a public enemy of the martial world and placed a bounty on you!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.bandit.questD: Villagers face not only zombie attacks but also threats from gangs!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.bandit.questN: Crush the Strong and Aid the Weak
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.challenger.qu: Gang Leader: Some brothers have heard of your martial prowess and wish to test their skills against you. What do you say?
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.gang_leader.q: Gang Leader: Damn it! This is the second time this year someone's come to challenge our dojo while I'm ill. They think our gang has no capable members? Go teach them a lesson!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.ming_xia.ques: Kill one of the Four Great Daxia.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.ming_xia_1.qu: Gang Leader: Although the current world's best is the Staff King, Dong Daxia, with your skills you could challenge him for the title!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.ming_xia_2.qu: Gang Leader: Although the current world's best is the Blade Sage, Xu Daxia, with your skills you could challenge him for the title!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.ming_xia_3.qu: Gang Leader: Although the current world's best is the Northern Fist, Xiao Daxia, with your skills you could challenge him for the title!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.ming_xia_4.qu: Gang Leader: Although the current world's best is the Sword Immortal, Zhang Daxia, with your skills you could challenge him for the title!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.mob.questDesc: If grievances are not clearly repaid, one lives in vain as a true man.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.pillager.ques: Gang Leader: The ill-omened patrols keep clashing with us, they're asking for trouble! Take them out!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.tiger.questDe: This great beast always preys on the villagers. Be careful, hero!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.tiger.questNa: Eliminate the Scourge for the People
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.villager.ques: Gang Leader: These troublesome villagers have some nerve! They've rejected our collectors several times. Go give them a warning they won't forget!
Kill the Chicken to Scare the Monkey
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.villain.quest: Village Chief: A villain in the village is plundering everywhere. Great hero, can you help us?!
Suppress Tyrants and Pacify the People
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.wandering_tra: Since you flaunt your treasures, don't blame me for being ruthless! Hehehe...
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.zombie.questD: Seeing injustice on the road, drawing the sword to help – only this merits the title of a true hero.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.kill.zombie.questR: Kill 1 zombie inside the village at night.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.money.questDescrip: Gang Leader: These days everything costs money. Even a hero can be brought down by lack of coin. Brother, can you raise some funds for the gang?
quest.chang_sheng_jue.no_abandon.button: Cannot abandon a quest that doesn't exist
quest.chang_sheng_jue.no_quest: No active quests at the moment!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.raid.village.quest: Gang Leader: A village under our gang's protection is under attack! Hurry and defend our granary!
quest.chang_sheng_jue.raid.xing_xia_zhan: A nearby village is being invaded by a horde of zombies. Would you be willing to risk yourself to help?
Remain in the village and assist the villagers in resisting the zombies.
quest.chang_sheng_jue.treat.village.ques: Gang Leader: A nearby village was attacked by zombies, and many villagers have turned into zombie villagers. I heard you have some medical skills, brother. Would you go check it out?
sounds.chang_sheng_jue.sunflower_point_c: Kungfu Kui Hua Dian Xue Shou
sounds.chang_sheng_jue.wu_gang_cut_gui_s: Kungfu Wu Gang cuts the laurel
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.dugu_nine_swords: Before Mastery: External technique deals (Main Hand Weapon Damage + 1) * 1.8 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Damage multiplier increased to 2.2x. When using a sword, Bleed chance is increased by 25%.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
The ultimate pinnacle of sword arts, encompassing the secrets of all things.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.durian.tooltip: Please use an axe to split it open
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.flying_dagger_po: Pick up and right-click a throwing knives Pouch in inventory to store throwing daggers
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.gao_marksmanship: Before Mastery: External technique deals (Main Hand Weapon Damage + 1) * 1.8 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Damage multiplier increased to 2.1x. When using a spear, Knockback chance is increased by 150% (x2.5).\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
A flash of cold steel arrives first, followed by the spear striking like a dragon.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.ge_shan_da_niu.h: Before Mastery: External technique ignores blocks, dealing 22 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Attack range increased by 2 blocks.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.ge_shan_da_niu.t: Divine skill unparalleled under heaven, why bully the ox?
Before Mastery: Increases armor by 4. Upon taking damage, grants Absorption III.\nAfter Mastery: Increases armor by 8. Absorption effect is upgraded to V upon taking damage.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Impervious to swords and spears, like a solid golden bell.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.golden_black_kni: Before Mastery: External technique deals (Main Hand Weapon Damage + 1) * 1.9 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Damage multiplier increased to 2.0x. When using a knife, Critical Hit chance is doubled (x2.0).\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
No matter how you change, I will break through with a single slash!
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.hercules.hold_sh: Before Mastery: Reduces hunger consumption from sprinting to 60%%.\nAfter Mastery: Right-clicking with Golden Thread Gloves in the main hand opens an Ender Chest.\nMastery: Achieved after moving a total of %s meters.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.hercules.tooltip: Channeling strength with inner energy, possessing boundless power.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.immortal_miracle: Before Mastery: Negates fatal damage once when near death.\nAfter Mastery: Cooldown reduced by 15 seconds.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Deathless and undying, how can it be but an illusion?
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.inner_armor_data: Please use a chestplate for lining
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.paoding.hold_shi: Before Mastery: 50%% chance to drop extra meat when killing animals with a Cleaver in the main hand.\nAfter Mastery: 75%% chance to drop extra meat.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.paoding.tooltip: With repeated practice, one masters the principle; thus, it becomes effortless and natural.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.qian_kun_da_nuo_:
Before Mastery: 35%% chance to reflect damage taken back to the attacker at 1.5x after 1.0 second.
After Mastery: For each additional health point, increases trigger chance by 2%%.
Cooldown increases by 2 seconds for a short time after each use.
Mastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Stimulates potential, pulls and shifts energy. Its variations are unpredictable and unimaginable.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.relentless_throw: Before Mastery: Throwing knife damage increased to 1.25x and can throw 3 knives at once.\nAfter Mastery: Throwing knife damage increased to 1.5x and can throw 7 knives at once.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
The throwing knives are ruthless, but the person wielding them holds sentiment.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.shaolin_stick_me: Before Mastery: External technique deals (Main Hand Weapon Damage + 1) * 1.7 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Damage multiplier increased to 2.0x. When using a stick, Stun chance is increased by 150% (x2.5).\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
All martial arts originate from Shaolin; a stick staff can settle the world.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.structural_locat: At [x=%d | z=%d] there stands a %s, go check it out
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.sunflower_point_: Before Mastery: Immobilizes targets with less than 25 max health for 1.5 seconds.\nAfter Mastery: Immobilizes targets with less than 200 max health for 2 seconds.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Fingers like a swift wind, momentum like lightning.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.the_classics_of_: Before Mastery: Reduces hunger cost of unleashing techniques by 1.\nAfter Mastery: Reduces both hunger and saturation cost of unleashing techniques by 1.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
A martial arts manual dreamt of by all in the martial world.
Pick up and right-click throwing knives in inventory to store them in the pouch
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.tread_the_snow_w: Before Mastery: Allows a double jump.\nAfter Mastery: Allows a triple jump.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Come and go without a shadow, free and unconstrained.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.turtle_breath_wo: Before Mastery: After activation, allows holding breath underwater longer for a duration, and prevents animals from attacking proactively.\nAfter Mastery: Breath-holding effect is improved.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Although the turtle has a nose, it breathes through its ears.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.wheat_nugget_enc: Before Mastery: 25%% chance per trade to gain 5 experience.\nAfter Mastery: 35% chance per trade to gain 10 experience.\nMastery: Achieved upon reaching experience level 30.
Learning comes from diligence; reading ten thousand books by the light of the firefly.
Before Mastery: Using a Xuanhua Axe to chop a tree destroys the entire tree.\nAfter Mastery: Chopping down entire trees is significantly faster.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Why focus on killing techniques? Better to please the heart.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.xuannu_swordsman: Before Mastery: External technique deals (Main Hand Weapon Damage + 1) * 2.2 damage.\nAfter Mastery: Damage multiplier increased to 2.5x. When using a soft sword, Bleed chance is tripled (x3.0).\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Using skill to borrow strength, using softness to overcome hardness.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.yugong_moves_mou: Before Mastery: Using a Mountain-Pickaxe increases mining area to 2x2.\nAfter Mastery: Mining area increased to 3x3.\nMastery: Achieved after successfully unleashing %s times.
Endless and unceasing, until the mountains are flat.
tooltip.chang_sheng_jue.zhang_men_xin_xu: Before Mastery: A single trade with a Villager promotes them to Apprentice level.\nAfter Mastery: Additionally, 10%% chance not to consume the traded item.\nMastery: Achieved after trading with villagers %s times.
The world of Jianghu isn't about killing; it's about human relationships and worldly wisdom!
